statements: SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources;
SELECT * FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, creation_date FROM Resources WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_type ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT * FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC, creation_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY resource_type ASC
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Article' AND creation_date > '2020-06-01' ORDER BY resource_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM Resources
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_type IN ('Video','PDF')
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, url FROM videos WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT id, title, url FROM videos WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM study_guides WHERE topic = 'Math';
SELECT id, content FROM study_guides WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title FROM videos WHERE url LIKE '%youtube%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, title, url, duration FROM videos WHERE duration < 30 AND created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM study_guides WHERE topic = 'Mathematics' OR content LIKE '%algebra%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, topic, content FROM study_guides ORDER BY topic ASC, created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM video_tutorials;
SELECT id, title, description FROM video_tutorials ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, duration FROM video_tutorials WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT id, title FROM video_tutorials WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM study_guides ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT title, duration FROM video_tutorials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM study_guides ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author FROM study_guides WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM video_tutorials WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT student_id, access_date FROM student_access WHERE resource_id IN (SELECT id FROM video_tutorials WHERE duration > 120);
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, description, created_date FROM study_guides WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT guide_id, title, file_path FROM study_guides ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT tutorial_id, title, description FROM tutorials WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_id, title, resource_type FROM student_resources WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, video_url FROM tutorials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT guide_id, title, author FROM study_guides WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT sp.progress_id, sr.title, sp.progress_percent FROM student_progress sp JOIN student_resources sr ON sp.tutorial_id = sr.resource_id WHERE sp.student_id = '987e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT title, description, category FROM resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT tag_name, description FROM tags WHERE tag_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT title, category, created_at FROM resources WHERE media_type = 'Video' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT r.title, u.username, s.start_date, s.end_date FROM resources r JOIN subscriptions s ON r.resource_id = s.resource_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.active = TRUE;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, AVG(r.rating) AS avg_rating FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.first_name, u.last_name;
SELECT t.tag_name, r.title, r.description FROM tags t JOIN resources r ON t.tag_id = r.resource_id WHERE r.category = 'Science' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
